item.title: Welcome to our new website
item.description: We’ve launched our new team website. You can find here our research directions, academic highlights, blog posts, and team info.

item.title: Our first blog post
item.description: This is a sample blog post. Blog posts appear both here in News and in the Blog section. Add longer write-ups and tutorials here.

item.title: Sample Paper Title
item.description: Placeholder for the academic-format entry. Replace with your own. The actual citation line is built from front matter: Authors. Title. Accepted at Conference/Journal (Oral/Spotlight/Poster, top X%).
